name: summer
title: Responsive text summarization
description: Summer allows desktop web pages to be read in response to the size of the device a user is browsing with.
author: Luis Leiva, Sciling

scripts.docs: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json -d docs lib/summer.js || echo [sudo] npm i -g jsdoc
scripts.docco: docco lib/summer.js || echo [sudo] npm i -g doco
scripts.lint: eslint lib/summer.js || echo [sudo] npm i -g eslint
scripts.dist: grunt || echo Install dev dependencies: npm i
scripts.demo: http-server ./demo/ -o -a localhost || echo [sudo] npm i -g http-server
